column4: are all evolution configurations contained in .evolution or is there any other folder?
in .evolution only
ooh. i preserved my old .evolution before i upgraded to jaunty but evolution is still running the startup assistant. any idea why?
hmm, im pretty sure evo has a feature for backup.
yeah but you have to manually back configurations up
since i havent, will my old .evolution just be void?
there's no problem with receiving mail from my gmail account on evolution but I can't send email. my sending doesnt progress. any idea? :)
via imap, or pop?
oh..
smtp... you need to change port to 587... tls
receiving via pop. sending via smtp :)
Yeah, change the smtp port to 587, and the security to tls.
oh. at last, one of my two messages are already sent. it seems that it's just taking much time. right?
If they sent, then you have no problem :]
where can i change the smtp port?
hmm... get into account settings somehow?
sec, ill download evolution :p
aw. "Could not connect to smtp.gmail.com: Connection timed out" and "
Could not connect to smtp.gmail.com: No route to host"
Sec wtl
Go edit > Preferences
Then Mail account
and choose edit your gmail account
you there?
